member.name: T:Minima.TikTokLive.BaseWebcastMessage
member.summary: All webcast messages inherit from this class, their name must match the name of the message type provided by the TikTok Live API.

members.member:
Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Represents a chat message in the room.

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Represents a gift given in a TikTok live webcast.

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Represents a like event in the room. This is sent occasionally, not every time a user likes.

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Event data for a user performing an action in the room. e.g. Joining

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Statistics about the top viewers and the total viewer count in the room.

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
Represents a social interaction in the room. e.g. Following the streamer, sharing the stream

Thanks to the awesome people at TikTok-Live-Connector https://github.com/zerodytrash/TikTok-Live-Connector/blob/ecde03a3113b45c30e9d43b6a686ef6b40d297e2/.proto/tiktok-schema.ts
New subscriber notification message.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnChat(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastChatMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user sends a chat message in the TikTok Live chat.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnGift(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastGiftMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user sends a gift in the TikTok Live chat.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnLike(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastLikeMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user likes the TikTok Live stream. This is called occasionally, not every time a user likes.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnMemberMessage(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastMemberMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user performs an action in the TikTok Live chat. e.g. Joining

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnRoomUserSeqMessage(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastRoomUserSeqMessage)
member.summary: Invoked when updated statistics about the room's top viewers and total viewer count are received. Used internally to synchronize and .

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnSocialMessage(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastSocialMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user follows or shares the TikTok Live stream.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.ITikTokLiveEvents.OnSubNotify(Minima.TikTokLive.WebcastSubNotifyMessage)
member.summary: Called when a user subscribes to the TikTok Live stream.

member.name: P:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnector.ViewerCount
member.summary: Represents the amount of viewers in the room.

member.name: P:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnector.TopViewers
member.summary: Represents the top viewers in the room and their coins.

member.name: P:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnector.ConnectionUri
member.summary: The WebSocket URI of the tiktok-live-connector instance

member.name: P:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnector.Socket
member.summary: Gets the active WebSocket connection used by the TikTok Live Connector.

member.name: T:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnectorError
member.summary: Logged to the console when an error occurs while processing a message.

member.name: M:Minima.TikTokLive.TikTokLiveConnectorError.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logged to the console when an error occurs while processing a message.
